original_text: Jesus answered, ‘I have been with all of you for a long time. But still you do not seem to know me, Philip! Anyone who has seen me has seen the Father. So why do you say, “Show the Father to us”?
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 빌립아 내가 이렇게 오래 너희와 함께 있으되 네가 나를 알지 못하느냐 나를 본 자는 아버지를 보았거늘 어찌하여 아버지를 보이라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: 'I have been with all of you for a long time
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 오랫동안 너희 모두와 함께 있었다

sentences.original_text: But still you do not seem to know me, Philip!
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 여전히 너는 나를 모르는 것 같구나, 빌립아!
